item.description:
Details
Together , the nations largest, most successful personal introduction hosts the most successful; best attended singles parties North of Boston.

While holding events at many of NH"s most exclusive locations there are always new people in attendance, no two dances are ever the same. We continually have in attendance 300-450 quality single adults of all ages at every dance. The clientele, top notch - easy to find location, the fun, excitement and energy all add up to an unbeatable evening out. The dances are a great way to meet and mingle with other area singles in a great setting. Feel free to come solo, bring a friend, or bring a crowd - your bound to have fun.

All parties are SMOKE FREE and start at 8pm sharp and end at 1:am, good idea to arrive early.

Admission is $10.00 before 9:PM and $12.00 after 9:PM.
PROPER DRESS PLEASE, NO JEANS NO SNEAKERS, NO HATS.
Complimentary hors d'oeuvres until 8:30 pm.
Cash bar, free parking, door prizes
Professional D.J. - Takes requests and plays the music you want to hear and dance to.

We would like peoples feedback on interest in a New Years Eve Dance @ The Castelton in Windham, NH.
Please reply to : togethernh@msn.com

Exit 3 off Rt. 93 - turn left onto 11- down on left 1/4 mile.

Where
Castleton

RT.111 & RT.93 exit 3
Windham, NH 03087

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: How About Thanksgiving Day after Dance
